name: You've Been Served
description:
Using your keyboard, use "A" and "D" to switch lanes. You can also use the space bar to jump over obstacles. Collect energy drinks to run faster, if you collect papers you will be slowed down by the weight of bureaucracy. If the lawyer catches up to you, you must appear in court. 

Also dodge cars, they will kill you.

Jammers:

Drew Sander - Designer/coder/all around cool dude

Patrick Burkhard - Level designer/3D modeler/car re"designer". Master of the color red

Aaron Jessee - 3D modeler/foundation of team

Mikey Browny - 3D modeler/moral support

Aaron Jessee - 3D modeler/foundation of the team

Drew Kellett - Audio/the better Drew
